RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Random Note Generator and Quantizer
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: kschzt
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Generates random notes and quantizes them to musical scales. Place a note in octave 0 (C-0 to B-0) to trigger randomization in the next column. The trigger note's pitch sets the root note for the scale. Multiple pattern generators available including markov chains, euclidean rhythms, and melodic patterns.
